es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api

Interface IChartCursorController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChartCursorController

    public interface IChartCursorController
    Interface for controller of ChartCursor. Details of ChartCursor and its properties in AmCharts API
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro

      • setAdjustment

        void setAdjustment(java.lang.Number adjustment)
            throws IntegerException
        Set adjustment property.
        Adjustment property control the distance between cursor and balloon.
        Parameters:
        adjustment - Value for adjustment.
        Throws:
        IntegerException - Value for adjustment is not an integer number.

      • setValueLineAxis

        void setValueLineAxis(java.lang.String valueLineAxis)
               throws ChartException
        Set valueLineAxis property.
        Parameters:
        valueLineAxis - ValueAxis id that contains values of valueLine used by chartCursor.
        Throws:
        ChartException - Chart that use chartCursor doesn't contains a valueAxis with id equals to valueLineAxis.
